programme.title: Shtëpia ku lind dielli
programme.desc: Dave Bautista, Amy Smart. Pas një vrasjeje në klubin e natës ku punon një ish polic i sapo liruar nga burgu, ai vihet në kërkim të fajtorëve për të pastruar emrin e tij, ndërkohë që F.B.i-ja dhe disa kriminelë po e kërkojnë me çdo kusht.
programme.category: Aksion
krim

programme.title: Vendi i ëmbël
programme.desc: 2017. Australi 1920. Një fermer i moshuar vret një burrë të bardhë për vetmbrojtje dhe arratiset kur një grup njerëzish i vihen pas. Pasi detajet e krimit dalin në sipërfaqe, komuniteti nis të dyshojë nësë drejtësia po vihet vërtetë në vend.
programme.category: Uestern

programme.title: Kryqi
programme.desc: 2011. Brian Austin Green, Danny Trejo, Michael Clarke Duncan. Një njeri me superfuqi të fituara nga një kryq antik dhe skuadra e tij, vihen kundër një force djallëzore që kërkon shkatërrimin e njerëzimit.
programme.category: Aksion
fantazi

programme.title: 1911 Revolucion
programme.desc: Jackie Chan, Winston Chao. Bazuar në revolucionin e vitit 1911, ku forca ushtarake nën komandimin e Sun Yat-sen, rrëzojnë dinasitnë Qing dhe formojnë republikën e parë Kineze...
programme.category: Kinemaja Aziatike

programme.title: Garancia
programme.desc: Pasi luftuan krah për krah në Luftën Civlie Amerikane, dy miq të ngushtë e gjejnë veten përballë njëri - tjetrit, në dy anët e kundërta të ligjit, ndërsa paqja e pasluftës është në rrezik.
programme.category: Uestern

programme.title: Zënë në befasi
programme.desc: Michael Jai White, Steve Austin. Stërvitja e një skuadre të ndërhyrjes së shpejtë të policisë së Los Anxhelosit, do të marrë një kthesë vdekjeprurëse kur ata zihen në befasi nga dy banda të armatosura.
programme.category: Aksion

programme.title: Tre Musketieret
programme.desc: Bazuar në romanin me të njëjtin titull të shkrimtarit Aleksandër Dyma. Tre musketierët e mbretit bashkë me D'Artanjanin shpëtojnë mbretëreshën nga një komplot i kardinalit Rishelje.
programme.category: Regjia: Stephen Herek

programme.title: Hana
programme.desc: Saoirse Ronan, Eric Bana, Cate Blanchett. Një adoleshente e stërvitur nga babai për të qenë një vrasëse e përsosur, zbulon një sekret të së kaluarës që mund të vendosë gjithçka në dilemë, madje edhe ekzistencën e saj.
programme.category: Aksion
mister

programme.title: Vrit ose vdis
programme.desc: Cung Le, Dolph Lundgren. Pasi shpëton një vajzë nga një vëllazëriariane dhe vret disa prej tyre, një veteran i luftës së Irakut, përballet me shefin e pashpirt dhe ushtrinë e tij të vrasësve.
programme.category: Aksion

programme.title: Mercenarët 2
programme.desc: Sylvester Stallone, Bruce Willis, Jean-Claude Van Damme, Arnold Schwarzenegger, Chuck Norris. Aktorët më të dashur të aksionit, rikthehen në një film të papërsëritshëm. Nje mision në dukje i lehtë, do të kthehet në luftë për jetë a vdekje.
programme.category: Aksion

programme.title: Biri i shtatë
programme.desc: Ben Barnes, Jeff Bridges. Nje luftëtar legjendar, stërvit një djalosh me aftësi mbinatyrore, për t'ju kundërvënë një shtrige shpirtkeqe, e cila me ushtrinë e saj të përbindëshve i ka hapur luftë njerëzimit...
programme.category: Epik
aventurë
fantazi

programme.title: Lirimi i pengjeve
programme.desc: Tyrese Gibson, John Malkovich. Të armatosur deri në grykë dhe me një plan të mirëmenduar pengmarrjeje, një grup mercenarësh nisin hakmarrjen ndaj një kongresmeni amerikan. Por ata nuk e dinë që mes të pengjeve ndodhet një ish marins, i cili nuk do të ndal.
programme.category: Aksion

programme.title: Kauboj dhe alienë
programme.desc: Në vitin 1873 një anije kozmike mbërrin në Arizona për të pushtuar Tokën, duke nisur me rajonin e Perëndimit të egër. Një gurpim Kaubojsish dhe vendasit janë të vetmit pengesë në rrugën e tyre.
programme.category: Aksion

programme.title: Hajdutët e makinave
programme.desc: Ndërsa enden në botën e rrezikshme të vjedhjes së makinave në Los Anxhelos, dy shokë të ngushtë guxojnë të ringrejnë karrierën e tyre pas burgut, duke u kthyer nga hajdutë të vegjël në lojtarë të rëndësishëm të tregut ndërkombëtar të makinave.
programme.category: Aksion

programme.title: Sulltanet e jugut
programme.desc: Tony Dalton. Me 1 milion dollarë mund të besh një jetë të rehatshme. Me 3 milion, mund ta jetosh shumë here më mirë... Tani imagjinoni të keni 12 milion dollarë vetëm për veten tuaj.Por kjo, është historia sesi humbën 12 milion dollarë..
programme.category: Aksion
drame

programme.title: Ndjekja
programme.desc: Benicio Del Toro, Tommy Lee Jones. I përndjekur nga makthet e përjetuara në Kosovë, nga agjent i forcave speciale, Ajron Hellem është kthyer në kriminel në arrati dhe pas i është vënë njohësi më i mirë i teknikave të tij.
programme.category: Aksion

programme.title: Luftërat e rrugës
programme.desc: Steven Seagal, Meghan Ory. Rrugët e Siatëllit, janë pushtuar nga një drogë e re shumë e rrezikshme dhe polici Elijah Kane, bashkë me skuadrën e tij, bëjnë të pamundurën për të vënë para drejtësisë bandën kriminale, përgjegjëse për drogën.
programme.category: Aksion

programme.title: Plumbi i humbur
programme.desc: Gary Daniels, Vannessa Vasquez. Një agjent i DEA-s, shkon në Meksikë për të kërkuar ish gruan e tij gazetare, e cila është rrëmbyer nga lideri i një karteli droge.
programme.category: Aksion

programme.title: Lista e vrasjeve
programme.desc: Cuba Gooding Jr. Një biznesmen, rastësisht njihet me një vrasës profesionist. Duke menduar se gjithçka është një lojë, ai krijon një listë me 5 njerëzit që do të donte të eliminonte. Por një ditë, emrat e listës fillojnë të zhduken...
programme.category: Aksion

programme.title: Tre Musketierët
programme.desc: 2011.Logan Lerman, Milla Jovovich. Një riprodhim modern i kryeveprës së Aleksandër Dyma. D'Artanjani gjaknxehtë dhe 3 musketierët, përpiqen të ndalin një vrasëse bukuroshe dhe kontin e Bakingamit, që kërkon fronin e Francës.
programme.category: Aksion
aventurë

programme.title: Kërcim i lirë
programme.desc: 2016. Edhe pse shumë ndryshë nga njëri-tjetri, një balerinë dhe një muzikant që luan në rrugë, s'mund ta mohojnë tërheqjen dhe duke lënë mënjanë diferencat, ata fillojnë të përgatiten për një garë që mund t'ju ndryshojë jetën.
programme.category: Dramë
romancë

programme.title: Njeriu i motit
programme.desc: Nicolas Cage. Një parashikues moti, jeta personale e të cilit po shkon si mos më keq, merr një ofertë tunduese punësimi dhe vendoset përpara dilemës nëse duhet të ndjekë ëndrrën, apo të qëndrojë në përpjekje për të 'riparuar' gjithçka...
programme.category: Dramë

programme.title: Krenarë nga Kampton
programme.desc: 2015. Kandidat për çmim Oskar. Ngritja dhe rënia e grupit të repit, N.W.A dhe anëtarëve të tij: Eazy-E, Ice Cube dhe Dr. Dre. Djemtë e rinj nga Los Anxhelosi kthyen zemërimin dhe zhgënjimin në armën më të fuqishme që mund të imagjinohet: muzika.
programme.category: Dramë
biografi

programme.title: E vërteta...ai s'të ka qejf
programme.desc: Ben Affleck, Jennifer Aniston, Drew Barrymore. Një film mbi dashurinë dhe jetën në çift, mbi tentativat për të lexuar dhe zbërthyer sjelljet dhe marrëdhëniet njerëzore.
programme.category: Romancë

programme.title: Princi i humbur
programme.desc: Historia e vërtetë e Princit Xhon të Mbretërisë së Bashkuar, i cili vuante nga epilepsia. Pasi mbretërorët mësojnë sëmundjen e tij, e dërgojnë atë të rritet larg syrit të publikut, për të mos dëmtuar imazhin e familjes.
programme.category: Dramë
biografi

programme.title: Trishna
programme.desc: Freida Pinto, Riz Ahmed. Historia e romancës tragjike midis djalit të një biznesmeni britanik dhe vajzës indiane të një pronari triçikli...
programme.category: Një histori Indie

programme.title: Një dashuri e parezistueshme
programme.desc: Një vajzë e re përpiqet të përmbushë dëshirën e gjyshes së saj të ndjerë duke i dorëzuar personalisht një të panjohuri letrën e saj të fundit...
programme.category: Dramë

programme.title: Dhuruesi
programme.desc: Brenton Thwaites, Jeff Bridges, Meryl Streep. Në një botë pa luftra, pa vuajtje, pa emocione, një djalë i ri përzgjidhet që të mësojë nga 'Dhuruesi' se cfarë është kënaqësia dhe dhimbja e 'botës së vërtetë'...
programme.category: Drame
Fantashkencë

programme.title: Elvis dhe Nikson
programme.desc: Historia e patreguar e takimit midis Elvis Preslit dhe presidentit amerikan Riçard Nikson. Nje takim që rezultoi në një moment historik, të përjetësuar në fotografinë më të kërkuar në Arkivin Kombëtar të Amerikës.
programme.category: Histori e vërtetë

programme.title: Vulosur me një puthje
programme.desc: Pak para dasmës madhështore me një aktore të njohur, një këngëtar kauntri kthehet në Teksas për të shitur shtëpinë e familjes. Atje takon shoqen e fëmijërisë , më të cilën rizbulon gjërat e thjeshta në jetë të cilat i kishte harruar.
programme.category: Dramë
Romancë

programme.title: Pallati i bardhë
programme.desc: Susan Sarandon dhe James Spader interpretues te denje te nje historie te zjarrte dashurie, te vleresuar nga kritika. Nje djale i ri i ve dhe nje grua e guxhimshme do te jetojne nje pasion nga ato qe te ndryshojne jeten.
programme.category: Dramë romantike

programme.title: Ftesë në çift
programme.desc: 2019. Beni dhe Alisa, shokë prej gjimnazit, duke qënë ende beqarë, bien dakort të shoqërojnë njëri-tjetrin në çdo dasmë ku janë të ftuar. Por shoqëria e gjatë dhe e fortë, vihet në provë pas një nate ku ata i kalojnë kufitjë e miqësisë.
programme.category: Romancë

programme.title: Sprova e Kejt Mekollit
programme.desc: Kate Beckinsale, Nick Nolte. Në përpjekje për t'u ripranuar në 'Dhomën Kombëtare të Avokatisë' dhe për të rimarrë kujdestarinë e të bijës, një avokate merr përsipër të apelojë çështjen e një gruaje të akuzuar padrejtësisht për vrasje.
programme.category: Dramë

programme.title: Xhonatani
programme.desc: 2018. Ansel Elgort. Një djalë i ri, që vuan nga identiteti i dyfishtë, trondit balancën që ka vendosur me vështirësi në jetën e tij, kur dy personalitetet e tij dashurohen pas të njëjtës vajzë.
programme.category: Dramë
fantashkencë

programme.title: Sundojmë qytetin
programme.desc: Një gazetar i ri zbulon një skandal që përfshin një politikan të rëndësishëm. Dy anëtarët e stafit politik përpiqen të mbajnë nën kontroll shefin e tyre dhe të fshehin skandalin, për të shpëtuar vendin e punës.
programme.category: Dramë

programme.title: Galeta
programme.desc: Jeff Bridges. Historia e një gare të madhe amerikane. Bazuar në ndodhinë e vërtetë të 3 burrave dhe të garës më të famshme me kuaj te njohur nga një komb i tërë. Film nga producenti kandidat per çmimin Oskar, Gary Ross.
programme.category: Dramë

programme.title: Balerini i fundit i Maos
programme.desc: Bazuar në autobiografinë e Li Cunxin, një prej balerinëve më të talentuar kinezë. Që nga fillimet e tij në një fshat të varfër, arritja në majat e suksesit, e deri tek problemet e panumërta që shkaktoi qëndrimi i përhershëm në Amerikë.
programme.category: Dramë
biografi

programme.title: Më fal, por të kam dashuri
programme.desc: Raoul Bova, Michela Quattrociocche. Një 37 vjeçar, i cili s'beson më tek dashuria, fillon një romancë të çiltër me një vajzë shumë më të re në moshë, e cila kërkon vetëm të dashurohet...
programme.category: Romancë

programme.title: Mrekulli në Santa Ana
programme.desc: Një film nga Spike Lee. Katër ushtarë afro-amerikanë gjejnë strehim në një fshat në Toskanë, gjatë Luftës II Botërore. Ata mbesin pas vijës së armikut kur njëri prej tyre rrezikon jetën e tij për të shpëtuar një djalë italian.
programme.category: Luftë
dramë

programme.title: Zoti Tolkin
programme.desc: Nicholas Hoult, Lily Collins. Vitet e formimit të J. R. R. Tolkien, autorit të trilogjisë 'Kryezoti i Unazave'. Një rikthim në periudhën më të bukur të jetës së tij, të cilën ai e jetoi me imagjinatë dhe që u ndërpre papritmas nga lufta.
programme.category: Biografi
dramë

programme.title: Vrasja e një dreri të shenjtë
programme.desc: Colin Farrell, Barry Keoghan. Një adoleshent integrohet në familjen e një kirurgu të njohur dhe gradualisht fillon të zbulojë qëllimet e tij të errëta, duke nxjerrë jashtë kontrollit jetën e doktorit.
programme.category: Horror psikologjik

programme.title: Nëse më do
programme.desc: Claudio Bisio. Pasi dështon në përpjekjen për vetvrasje, Diego, një avokat i suksesshëm në depresion, vendos që mundësinë e dytë të jetës, ta shfrytëzojë duke ndihmuar të tjerët.
programme.category: Komedi

programme.title: Kopshti i fshehtë
programme.desc: Colin Firth, Julie Walters. Pas vdekjes së prindërve, Meri, një vajzë e vetmuar me imagjinatë të gjallë, largohet nga India për të jetuar me xhaxhain në Angli. Atje ajo do të zbulojë një kopshti magjik, që do të ndryshojë jetën e saj përgjithmonë.
programme.category: Fantazi
dramë

programme.title: Trashëgimia
programme.desc: 2020. Lily Collins. Kreu i një familjeje të pasur dhe të pushtetshme vdes papritur, duke i lënë trashëgimi gruas dhe vajzës së tij një sekret tronditës që kërcënon të shkatërrojë jetën e tyre.
programme.category: Thriller
dramë
mister

programme.title: Më vodhën celularin
programme.desc: Regjisor: Fausto Brizzi. Me Pasquale Petrolo, Paolo Ruffini. Jeta e Sabinos dhe Ivanos, dy sanitarë në aeroport, do të ndryshojë përgjithmonë kur ata gjejnë në banjo, celularin e një njëriu shumë të rëndësishëm.
programme.category: Komedi

programme.title: Unë ende besoj
programme.desc: KJ Apa, Britt Robertson, Shania Twain. Bazuar në historinë e vërtetë dhe emocionuese të këngëtarit amerikan Jeremy Camp dhe gruas së tij të parë, Melissa Lynn Henning-Camp, e cila u diagnostikua me kancer pak para se të martoheshin.
programme.category: Dramë
romancë
muzikë

programme.title: Tomi dhe Xherri
programme.desc: Një rivalitet legjendar rindizet kur Xherri zhvendoset në hotelin më të mirë të Nju Jorkut, në prag të 'dasmës së shekullit'. Panifikuesja e dëshpëruar e dasmës (Chloë Grace Moretz), detyrohet të punësojë Tomin për të hequr qafe të paftuarin Xherri...
programme.category: Vizatimor
komedi
familje

programme.title: Lajme nga bota
programme.desc: Kandidat për 4 çmime Oskar 2021. Tom Hanks. Një veteran i Luftës Civile që udhëton qytet më qytet duke lexuar lajmet, ndërmerr një udhëtim të rrezikshëm nëpër Teksas për të dërguar një vajzë jetime, në shtëpinë e saj të re.
programme.category: Dramë
western
aksion

programme.title: Komb i robëruar
programme.desc: Me John Goodman. Një forcë jashtëtokësore ka pushtuar Tokën, duke mashtruar njerëzimin me premtimin për paqe dhe unitet. Një djalë i ri vihet përballë zgjedhjes së vështirë për bashkëpunim, ose kundërshtim.
programme.category: Fantashkencë
thriller

programme.title: Dedpull 2
programme.desc: Ryan Reynolds. Dedpulli, superheroi më i paparë i universit krijon një ekip të ri, X-Forcën, me objektivin për të mbrojtur një adoleshent me superfuqi nga Keibëlli, mutanti i cili vjen nga e ardhmja për ta vrarë...
programme.category: Aksion
komedi

programme.title: Djem dhe vajza
programme.desc: F. Prinze Jr, C. Forlani. Xhenifer dhe Rajen njihen prej shumë kohësh. Në kolegj ata bëhen shokë të ngushtë, dalin, flasin dhe ngushëllojnë njëri-tjetrin. Pastaj për çudi ata kalojnë një natë bashkë... Kjo ndryshon çdo gjë.
programme.category: Komedi romantike

programme.title: Mendo si burrë
programme.desc: Chris Brown, Gabrielle Union. Balanca e sekseve për 4 çifte do të prishet. Gratë po përdorin një libër për të menduar si burra, por kur partnerët zbulojnë sekretin, fillon edhe beteja e vërtetë. Kush do të fitojë?
programme.category: Komedi romantike

programme.title: Ish
programme.desc: Claudia Gerini, Silvio Orlando, Nancy Brilli. Historitë e dashurisë së gjashtë çifteve, të lindura, zhvilluara dhe ndërthurura prej Krishtlindjes deri në ditën e Shën Valentinit...
programme.category: Komedia Italiane

programme.title: Henku dhe Asha
programme.desc: Një studente indiane në Prage dhe një njujorkez i vetmuar komunikojne duke i dërguar njëri-tjetrit videomesazhe. Korrespondenca e pazakontë thellon lidhjen e tyre dhe ata duhet të vendosin nëse ka ardhur momenti të takohen.
programme.category: Komedi romantike

programme.title: Peripeci për Krishtlindje
programme.desc: Joel McHale. Robin Williams. Pasi harron dhuratat për djalin e tij, një njeri detyrohet të ndërmarrë një udhëtim 8 orësh vajtje ardhje, me babain e tij që nuk e shihte prej vitesh.
programme.category: Komedi

programme.title: Vizitorët
programme.desc: Christian Clavier, Jean Reno. Një kont dhe shërbëtori i tij, përmes magjisë së një magjistari, ecin përpara në kohë, në shekullin e 20-të, ku përballen me gjëra të panjohura dhe të frikshme për ta. Aventurat pasojnë njëra tjetrën.
programme.category: Komedi

programme.title: Puthja e parë
programme.desc: Hakani ka probleme me krijmin e marrëdhenieve afatgjata me gratë. Gjërat ndryshojnë kur bie në dashuri me shikim të parë me Baharin. Por ka një pengesë. Ai duhet ta bëjë të dashurohet me të cdo ditë nga e para.
programme.category: Komedi Romantike

programme.title: Funerali i çmendur
programme.desc: Tyler Perry. Anëtarët e një familjeje nisen në një bashkim të gëzueshëm farefisnor. Udhëtimi i tyre kthehet në makth kur befas festa shndërrohet në një varrim që kërcënon të zbulojë sekrete të pahijshme familjare...
programme.category: Komedi

programme.title: Gjej një punë
programme.desc: Pasi mbarojnë universitetin, një i ri (Miles Teller) dhe e dashura e tij (Anna Kendrick) e kanë shumë të vështirë të gjejnë një punë që ia vlen.
programme.category: Komedi

programme.title: Në vendlindje
programme.desc: 2014. Salvatore Ficarra, Valentino Picone. Dy shokë, largohen nga kryeqyteti për të jetuar në qytezën e origjinës, aty ku jeta është më pak e kushtueshme dhe më e thjeshtë. Ky realitet i ri, do t'i rezervojë shumë surpriza.
programme.category: Komedi

programme.title: Nëntë muaj
programme.desc: Hugh Grant, Julianne Moore. Jeta e qetë e pa nderlikime e një çifti të dashuruarish do të tronditet nga një lajm i papritur: ajo është shtatzënë. Nga ky çast një varg peripecish do t'i shoqerojnë gjatë nëntë muaj pritjeje.
programme.category: Komedi romantike

programme.title: Galeria e zemrave të thyera
programme.desc: 2020. Pasi braktiset nga i dashuri, një e re nga Nju Jorku krijon një galeri me sendet e ruajtura nga lidhjet e mëparshme dhe zbulon se ajo nuk është e vetmja që ka nevojë për pak ndihmë për t'i hedhur gjërat pas krahëve.
programme.category: Komedi
romancë

programme.title: Akademia e seksit
programme.desc: Ben Chyler Leigh, Jaime Pressly, Chris Evans. Parodi e disa filmave të njohur adoleshentësh si: Ëmbëlsi Amerikane, Bukuri Amerikane, Road Trip, 10 gjërat që urrej tek ty.
programme.category: Parodi

programme.title: Kalorësit
programme.desc: Dennis Quaid, Ziyi Zhang. Nje detektiv ende në zi për humbjen e bashkëshortes së tij përfshihet në hetimet e një serie vrasjesh që kanë të bëjnë me profecinë biblike të Katër Kalorësve të Apokalipsit.
programme.category: Thriller

programme.title: Hakmarrja e burrit
programme.desc: 2017. Një fermer irlandez i moshës së mesme, tepër i sjellshëm dhe i përkushtuar ndaj nënës së tij, nis një hakmarrje të përgjakshme pasi ajo vritet gjatë një përpjekje për të grabitur shtëpinë e tyre.
programme.category: Thriller
krim

programme.title: Të panjohur
programme.desc: Jim Caviezel, Greg Kinnear, Bridget Moynahan. Pesë njerëz të panjohur, zgjohen pa asnjë lloj kujtese brenda një magazine të mbyllur. Tani për të mbijetuar, ata duhet të zbulojnë të vërtetën se kush është secili prej tyre.
programme.category: Mister
krim

programme.title: Lidhja e erret e motrave
programme.desc: Një adoleshente rrëfen se është viktimë e një grupimi sekret vajzash gjimnaziste, i quajtur "Motra e Natës". Nga ky moment, një qytet i qetë periferik bëhet sfondi i një gjyqi modern të shtrigave të Salemit.
programme.category: Thriller

programme.title: Pushteti suprem
programme.desc: 2014. Frymëzuar nga ngjarje të vërteta. Pasi nje neo-nazist i sapo liruar me kusht merr peng një familje afro-ameikanësh, babai përdor të kaluarën e tyre të ngjashme për ta bindur atë që të mos vrasë familjen e tij.
programme.category: Thriller

programme.title: Tranzit
programme.desc: 2012. Jim Caviezel, Harold Perrineau. Pushimet e një familjeje do të kthehen në një tmerr të vertetë, kur një bandë grabitësish fsheh në makinën e tyre një çantë të mbushur me para, për ta kaluar përtej postbllokut të policisë...
programme.category: Krim
thriller

programme.title: Ajër
programme.desc: Norman Reedus, Djimon Hounsou. Në të ardhmen e afërt, oksigjeni në Tokë nuk ekziston dhe 2 inxhinierë të ngarkuar me misionin e ruajtes së shpresës së fundit të njerëzimit, rrezikojnë të shkatërrojnë njëri-tjetrin...
programme.category: Fantashkencë

programme.title: JCVD
programme.desc: Prodhim i vitit 2008. Jean-Claude Van Damme në rolin e një aktori filmash aksion, që rrezikon familjen dhe karrierën kur përfshihet rastësisht në një grabitje të zyrës postare në vendlindjen e tij, Belgjikë.
programme.category: Krim
drame

programme.title: Çdo minutë vlen
programme.desc: Nicolas Cage. Një agjent veteran i C.I.A-s, urdhërohet të dalë në pension. Por kur nje terrorist i pashpirt del sërish në skenë, ai rikthehet në misionin më të rrezikshëm anti - terrorizëm...
programme.category: Thriller

programme.title: Pengmarrja
programme.desc: 2011. N.Cage, N.Kidman. Një çift i pasur dhe vajza e tyre, merren peng brenda shtëpisë nga një bandë grabitësish. Ata do te bëjë gjithçka për të shpëtuar njeri-tjetrin, madje edhe kur lindin dyshime, se njëri prej tyre është pjesë e grabitjes.
programme.category: Krim
thriller

programme.title: Prania e së ligës
programme.desc: Bazuar në romanin e Henry James. Një dado e re punësohet të kujdeset për dy fëmijë të trazuar pas vdekjes së papritur të prindërve të tyre, por ajo shpejt kupton se jetimët dhe shtëpia ku ata jetojnë fshehin sekrete të errëta.
programme.category: Horror

programme.title: I See You

1st half of the movie is originating puzzles, complicating the story; while the other half is filling in the gaps to solve that puzzles in a very unique way of back-patching/filling parallel events

Also, the sound-effects are very unique and different from usual, heard a bit new things

And, Yes, Passively marketing a few new terminologies and Singers/Songs :)

Amonit
programme.desc: Ammonite: Directed by Francis Lee. With Sarah White, Liam Thomas, Sam Parks, Kate Winslet. 1840s England, acclaimed but overlooked fossil hunter Mary Anning and a young woman sent to convalesce by the sea develop an intense relationship, altering both of their lives forever." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt7983894/","name":"Ammonite","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZmM3ZGZlMWUtMjY1OS00NjBkLWE4MjQtODJkMmQ1MzdjYzhkXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTkxNjUyNQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"1840s England, acclaimed but overlooked fossil hunter Mary Anning and a young woman sent to convalesce by the sea develop an intense relationship, altering both of their lives forever.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt7983894/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"reyesrh"},"dateCreated":"2020-12-20","inLanguage":"English","name":"Silence Art","reviewBody":"I just wanna point out that the scenes with no dialogue are the one's that say a lot ... Kate Winslet masters the way she talks only with her eyes.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":13798,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.5},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Biography","Drama","History"],"datePublished":"2020-11-13","keywords":"lesbian romance,female scientist,period drama,based on real person,lesbianism","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Official Trailer 2","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi4176724249","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BM2FkZjMzY2MtOTY4Zi00ODg3LTk5MDEtZDg1YmE2NzQ3OTVkXkEyXkFqcGdeQXNuZXNodQ@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BM2FkZjMzY2MtOTY4Zi00ODg3LTk5MDEtZDg1YmE2NzQ3OTVkXkEyXkFqcGdeQXNuZXNodQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"In the 1840s, acclaimed self-taught palaeontologist Mary Anning works alone on the wild and brutal Southern English coastline of Lyme Regis. The days of her famed discoveries behind her, she now hunts for common fossils to sell to rich tourists to support herself and her ailing widowed mother. When one such tourist, Roderick Murchison, arrives in Lyme on the first leg of a European tour, he entrusts Mary with the care of his young wife Charlotte, who is recuperating from a personal tragedy. Mary, whose life is a daily struggle on the poverty line, cannot afford to turn him down but, proud and relentlessly passionate about her work, she clashes with her unwanted guest. They are two women from utterly different worlds. Yet despite the chasm between their social spheres and personalities, Mary and Charlotte discover they can each offer what the other has been searching for: the realisation that they are not alone. It is the beginning of a passionate and all-consuming love affair that will defy all social bounds and alter the course of both lives irrevocably."},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000701/","name":"Kate Winslet"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1519680/","name":"Saoirse Ronan"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0428121/","name":"Gemma Jones"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0497274/","name":"Francis Lee"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0103694/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0037450/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0605911/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0497274/","name":"Francis Lee"}],"duration":"PT2H"}</script><metacontent="

They set out to find the origin of Elsa's powers in order to save their kingdom." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt4520988/","name":"Frozen II","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjA0YjYyZGMtN2U0Ni00YmY4LWJkZTItYTMyMjY3NGYyMTJkXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNDg4NjY5OTQ@._V1_.jpg","description":"Anna, Elsa, Kristoff, Olaf and Sven leave Arendelle to travel to an ancient, autumn-bound forest of an enchanted land. They set out to find the origin of Elsa's powers in order to save their kingdom.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt4520988/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Gunsjoe"},"dateCreated":"2019-11-20","inLanguage":"English","name":"Somehow they've gone a bit backwards","reviewBody":"This movie has beautiful visuals. The scenes and animation is breathtaking. I liked that very much.

Here's a controversial opinion; I quite liked the music and songs as well though It lacks the iconic catchy tunes from the first one.

My biggest complaint and the one thing that let this down is the story. Its way too simplistic. Now granted the first one wasn't Mark-Twain like either but you get the feeling that it was more substantial than this and as an adult there was more in the first one for you than this.

I'm still rating this pretty good because as much as I'm personally underwhelmed by the story, I'm not the target audience. This is a movie for little children and I guess they might have a different opinion. I wouldn't know for sure since I dont have children to take to the movies. programme.title: Fantastic Beasts and Where to Find Them
Čudesne zvijeri i gdje ih pronaći
programme.desc:
Fantastic Beasts and Where to Find Them: Directed by David Yates. With Eddie Redmayne, Sam Redford, Scott Goldman, Tim Bentinck. The adventures of writer Newt Scamander in New York's secret community of witches and wizards seventy years before Harry Potter reads his book in school." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt3183660/","name":"Fantastic Beasts and Where to Find Them","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjMxOTM1OTI4MV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwODE5OTYxMDI@._V1_.jpg","description":"The adventures of writer Newt Scamander in New York's secret community of witches and wizards seventy years before Harry Potter reads his book in school.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt3183660/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"goolizap"},"dateCreated":"2016-11-23","inLanguage":"English","name":"Twizard Rating: 93","reviewBody":"A lot has changed since the first Harry Potter film was released in 2001. Heck, a lot has changed since the LAST Harry Potter film was released in 2011. The franchise helped change our modern interpretation of what a film series can be. And this prequel spin-off is proof of that. While this isn't a Harry Potter movie, it's part of the same world.

In the 15 years since Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone, blockbuster films have become consistently good. Critically acclaimed. It's not just popcorn entertainment anymore--we have higher expectations. And as the blockbusters strive for the quality of the more highbrow indie offerings being nominated for Oscars, they begin resembling them in a way.

The Harry Potter films, especially the first few, had a sort of snappy storytelling to them. Fantastic Beasts and Where to Find Them does not. It's much slower like the later films in the previous series. Yet, the difference is, this is the setup to the next four films. By the time we got to the last few Harry Potter movies, we weren't exactly looking for a brisk narrative. And I was hoping for this in Fantastic Beasts--albeit, probably unrealistically.

Set in 1926, an English wizard, Newt (Eddie Redmayne), comes to America for McGuffin-like reasons (and unclear, at that). He gets into some trouble as some of the fantastic beasts escape from the suitcase where he's keeping them. As this is happening, he gets mixed in with a normal non-magical human, Jacob (Dan Fogler).

Other assorted things happen that are appealing to the audience. We get to go inside this magical suitcase and see dozens of unique creatures in this new expanded universe. It's really cool and aesthetically pleasing.

The movie is long and not enough happens to truly justify it. Instead of using the time to thoroughly explain some of the overarching story lines, the filmmakers spend it drawing things out. Perhaps because they feel like they have to.

Don't get me wrong, the film is great. It's thoroughly enjoyable. It does most of the things a good film should do. While the storytelling isn't quick, it's still very even.

This is what director David Yates is good at, as evident in the last four Harry Potter films he directed. Though Fantastic Beasts is missing the magical world that is Hogwarts, Yates knows how to bring alive New York City in the '20s and make it feel magical.

You will most likely enjoy Fantastic Beasts. If for no other reason than the fact that it's the ingress back into the beloved world of Harry Potter.And Easter eggs are scattered all around. Just don't go into it with the same expectations as its predecessors.

Twizard Rating: 93","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":9}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":431878,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.3},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Adventure","Family","Fantasy"],"datePublished":"2016-11-16","keywords":"magic,wizard,suitcase,based on novel,magical creature","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Final Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1553839641","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOTExOTQ2NDg2MF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwODYyOTYxMDI@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOTExOTQ2NDg2MF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwODYyOTYxMDI@._V1_.jpg","description":"The adventures of writer Newt Scamander in New York's secret community of witches and wizards seventy years before Harry Potter reads his book in school."},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1519666/","name":"Eddie Redmayne"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2239702/","name":"Katherine Waterston"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0837223/","name":"Alison Sudol"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0946734/","name":"David Yates"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0159772/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0002663/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0746830/","name":"J.K. Rowling"}],"duration":"PT2H12M"}</script><metacontent="

With Eddie Redmayne, Sam Redford, Scott Goldman, Tim Bentinck. The adventures of writer Newt Scamander in New York's secret community of witches and wizards seventy years before Harry Potter reads his book in school." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt3183660/","name":"Fantastic Beasts and Where to Find Them","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjMxOTM1OTI4MV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwODE5OTYxMDI@._V1_.jpg","description":"The adventures of writer Newt Scamander in New York's secret community of witches and wizards seventy years before Harry Potter reads his book in school.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt3183660/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"goolizap","dateCreated":"2016-11-23","inLanguage":"English","name":"Twizard Rating: 93","reviewBody":"A lot has changed since the first Harry Potter film was released in 2001. Heck, a lot has changed since the LAST Harry Potter film was released in 2011. The franchise helped change our modern interpretation of what a film series can be. And this prequel spin-off is proof of that. While this isn't a Harry Potter movie, it's part of the same world.

In the 15 years since Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone, blockbuster films have become consistently good. Critically acclaimed. It's not just popcorn entertainment anymore--we have higher expectations. And as the blockbusters strive for the quality of the more highbrow indie offerings being nominated for Oscars, they begin resembling them in a way.

The Harry Potter films, especially the first few, had a sort of snappy storytelling to them. Fantastic Beasts and Where to Find Them does not. It's much slower like the later films in the previous series. Yet, the difference is, this is the setup to the next four films. By the time we got to the last few Harry Potter movies, we weren't exactly looking for a brisk narrative. And I was hoping for this in Fantastic Beasts--albeit, probably unrealistically.

Set in 1926, an English wizard, Newt (Eddie Redmayne), comes to America for McGuffin-like reasons (and unclear, at that). He gets into some trouble as some of the fantastic beasts escape from the suitcase where he's keeping them. As this is happening, he gets mixed in with a normal non-magical human, Jacob (Dan Fogler).

Other assorted things happen that are appealing to the audience. We get to go inside this magical suitcase and see dozens of unique creatures in this new expanded universe. It's really cool and aesthetically pleasing.

The movie is long and not enough happens to truly justify it. Instead of using the time to thoroughly explain some of the overarching story lines, the filmmakers spend it drawing things out. Perhaps because they feel like they have to.

Don't get me wrong, the film is great. It's thoroughly enjoyable. It does most of the things a good film should do. While the storytelling isn't quick, it's still very even.

This is what director David Yates is good at, as evident in the last four Harry Potter films he directed. Though Fantastic Beasts is missing the magical world that is Hogwarts, Yates knows how to bring alive New York City in the '20s and make it feel magical.

You will most likely enjoy Fantastic Beasts. If for no other reason than the fact that it's the ingress back into the beloved world of Harry Potter.And Easter eggs are scattered all around. Just don't go into it with the same expectations as its predecessors.

programme.title: Fantastic Beasts: The Crimes of Grindelwald
Fantastične Zvijeri: Grindelvaldovi Zločini
programme.desc: Fantastic Beasts: The Crimes of Grindelwald: Directed by David Yates. With Johnny Depp, Kevin Guthrie, Carmen Ejogo, Wolf Roth. The second installment of the "Fantastic Beasts" series featuring the adventures of Magizoologist Newt Scamander." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt4123430/","name":"Fantastic Beasts: The Crimes of Grindelwald","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYWVlMDI5N2UtZTIyMC00NjZkLWI5Y2QtODM5NGE5MzA0NmVjXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU3NjUxMzE@._V1_.jpg","description":"The second installment of the "Fantastic Beasts" series featuring the adventures of Magizoologist Newt Scamander.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt4123430/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"maiajay13"},"dateCreated":"2018-11-15","inLanguage":"English","name":"More focused on franchise building than telling a good story!","reviewBody":"As both a lover of the Harry Potter Universe and a lover of movie going, I was thoroughly disappointed, even angry with this movie. While the visuals are as magical as ever, it's clear that the filmmakers are so distracted by trying to build a franchise that they're forgetting to actually tell a good story! The chemistry between our main four heroes was diluted by so many new characters being introduced. With so many new people and also so many questions for our old heroes, there wasn't enough time for any kind of (explainable) character development or for the viewers to connect with anyone on the screen. The only "character development" with one of our main heroes felt random and out of character and we aren't given much reason or warning for this change. I was also very disappointed with the writing behind Tina's character as her role was demoted from a strong willed Auror and woman to merely a side kick and love interest. Huge and important elements of the story were left for us only to assume what had happened when discussing the one year time jump between the two films (like the Jacob/Queenie relationship, Jacobs memory, etc.). As a whole, the film screamed "money hungry" and "franchise building" rather than letting us really connect with the characters. It also seemed as if they were only adding in twists that would surely get a reaction from viewers despite the fact that they not only discredited the original Harry Potter films, but just felt like unrealistic and a little too convenient! In short, as a huge fan of the Harry Potter Universe, I was disappointed, upset and felt really let down, and as a film goer, I was confused with the plot and frustrated with the lack of character connection and development! The only reason I have given a 4/10 instead of a 1 is for Eddie Redmayne's perfect execution of the shy, socially awkward but loveable and charming Newt Scamander and for the alluring performance from Jude Law's Dumbledore who leaves us wanting to know more of his history! But in the end, it was a huge disappointment as a stand-alone movie.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":4}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":241455,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.5},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Adventure","Family","Fantasy"],"datePublished":"2018-11-16","keywords":"wizard,magical creature,paris france,sequel,witch","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Watch the Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi965130777","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNTJlMmE1OTktODA5Yi00NDc3LTg4NDgtYzcyOTU2Nzg1OWU3XkEyXkFqcGdeQXZ3ZXNsZXk@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNTJlMmE1OTktODA5Yi00NDc3LTg4NDgtYzcyOTU2Nzg1OWU3XkEyXkFqcGdeQXZ3ZXNsZXk@._V1_.jpg","description":""},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1519666/","name":"Eddie Redmayne"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2239702/","name":"Katherine Waterston"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0283945/","name":"Dan Fogler"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0946734/","name":"David Yates"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0159772/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0002663/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0746830/","name":"J.K. Rowling"}],"duration":"PT2H14M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Inside Out
Izvrnuto obrnuto
programme.desc:
Inside Out: Directed by Pete Docter, Ronnie Del Carmen. With Amy Poehler, Phyllis Smith, Richard Kind, Bill Hader. After young Riley is uprooted from her Midwest life and moved to San Francisco, her emotions - Joy, Fear, Anger, Disgust and Sadness - conflict on how best to navigate a new city, house, and school." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt2096673/","name":"Inside Out","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOTgxMDQwMDk0OF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNjU5OTg2NDE@._V1_.jpg","description":"After young Riley is uprooted from her Midwest life and moved to San Francisco, her emotions - Joy, Fear, Anger, Disgust and Sadness - conflict on how best to navigate a new city, house, and school.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt2096673/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Heinzwill"},"dateCreated":"2016-07-29","inLanguage":"English","name":"Beyond Words...","reviewBody":"It's been nearly a year since I first saw this film. I would say I had pretty low knowledge in films before I first saw Inside Out (not to say that I'm highly intelligent on films now). I only saw about 200 films prior. I hadn't seen a lot of classic films or even know that film can be an art form just through its camera work among other aspects. So you could say that I can't speak for everyone on my views of this film. And you may be right because opinions are subjective anyway.

This is my favourite film ever.

Like I said above, I didn't see a lot of films that were deemed as masterpieces at that time. While I still have a lot more to see, I can say that I have caught up with many notable ones now. I've seen The Godfather. I've seen 2001: A Space Odyssey. I've seen Casablanca. I've seen The Shawshank Redemption. I've seen Pulp Fiction. I've seen Lawrence of Arabia.

Yet this is still my favourite film of all-time.

80 years from now, this won't change. I felt something extraordinary that will never be felt again. This to me, was a revelation. In honest words I've never experienced something like this before. Only because of Inside Out I was able to kick myself off of a serious depression I had for years, understand the meaning of feeling, feel sympathy to why people act the way they do, be interested in films. In fact, I went and watched the films I mentioned above because of Inside Out.

Ever since that late July of 2015 I had been compulsively obsessed with Inside Out to the point where I checked its Oscar chances, IMDb rating, Rotten Tomatoes rating and box office grosses to the point where I felt like I had to stop myself from doing as when seeing anything negative about it just makes feel let down and quite sad about it. It's still something that I'm trying to quit but obviously it's not going that well (ie. this review after one year of the film's release).

Inside Out taught me more about depression, empathy, importance of sorrow and interpersonal relationships than any books, talk shows, real-life stories or cat posters could ever dream of. It made me want to become a filmmaker because if this much craft and intelligence can be put in a film, then sign me up to the industry because I want to be a part of it. I don't want to talk about the story or the technical aspects of Inside Out because everyone has talked about it already.

In the course of less than ten months, I've see this film six times. That's more than any other film during the same period. It's a true testament to its strength and impact on me that's hardly ever going to fade away. I know this isn't the case for everybody. I keep trying to find anybody else who had the same experience as I did walking out of this film for the first time. I yielded only little results and although it brings me down a little since I don't really have anyone else to relate to, I keep telling myself, that no matter what happens to Inside Out in the future, whether its Rotten Tomatoes score or IMDb rating or its overall stature among the general public, whether it gets worse or better for it, this will always be favourite film of all-time. Nothing will change that and I have to let go of everybody else's opinion whether or not they had similar emotional experiences towards it.

You can vote "not helpful" on this review all you want (which seems to be a recurring case for all positive user reviews here.... I wonder why...) but it's not going to matter anyway. This is a beautiful film that will resonate in me always.

programme.category: Animation, Adventure, Comedy, Animation, Adventure, Comedy, Drama, Family, Fantasy
programme.review: --- Actors: Amy Poehler (role=Joy), Phyllis Smith (role=Sadness), Richard Kind (role=Bing Bong), Bill Hader (role=Fear), Lewis Black (role=Anger), Mindy Kaling (role=Disgust), Kaitlyn Dias (role=Riley), Diane Lane (role=Mom), Kyle MacLachlan (role=Dad), Paula Poundstone (role=Forgetter Paula), Bobby Moynihan (role=Forgetter Bobby), Paula Pell (role=Dream Director /)

IMDb data; ttnr: 2096673, Title: Inside Out, --- Description: Inside Out: Directed by Pete Docter, Ronnie Del Carmen. With Amy Poehler, Phyllis Smith, Richard Kind, Bill Hader. After young Riley is uprooted from her Midwest life and moved to San Francisco, her emotions - Joy, Fear, Anger, Disgust and Sadness - conflict on how best to navigate a new city, house, and school." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt2096673/","name":"Inside Out","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOTgxMDQwMDk0OF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNjU5OTg2NDE@._V1_.jpg","description":"After young Riley is uprooted from her Midwest life and moved to San Francisco, her emotions - Joy, Fear, Anger, Disgust and Sadness - conflict on how best to navigate a new city, house, and school.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt2096673/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"Heinzwill","dateCreated":"2016-07-29","inLanguage":"English","name":"Beyond Words...","reviewBody":"It's been nearly a year since I first saw this film. I would say I had pretty low knowledge in films before I first saw Inside Out (not to say that I'm highly intelligent on films now). I only saw about 200 films prior. I hadn't seen a lot of classic films or even know that film can be an art form just through its camera work among other aspects. So you could say that I can't speak for everyone on my views of this film. And you may be right because opinions are subjective anyway.

This is my favourite film ever.

Like I said above, I didn't see a lot of films that were deemed as masterpieces at that time. While I still have a lot more to see, I can say that I have caught up with many notable ones now. I've seen The Godfather. I've seen 2001: A Space Odyssey. I've seen Casablanca. I've seen The Shawshank Redemption. I've seen Pulp Fiction. I've seen Lawrence of Arabia.

Yet this is still my favourite film of all-time.

80 years from now, this won't change. I felt something extraordinary that will never be felt again. This to me, was a revelation. In honest words I've never experienced something like this before. Only because of Inside Out I was able to kick myself off of a serious depression I had for years, understand the meaning of feeling, feel sympathy to why people act the way they do, be interested in films. In fact, I went and watched the films I mentioned above because of Inside Out.

Ever since that late July of 2015 I had been compulsively obsessed with Inside Out to the point where I checked its Oscar chances, IMDb rating, Rotten Tomatoes rating and box office grosses to the point where I felt like I had to stop myself from doing as when seeing anything negative about it just makes feel let down and quite sad about it. It's still something that I'm trying to quit but obviously it's not going that well (ie. this review after one year of the film's release).

Inside Out taught me more about depression, empathy, importance of sorrow and interpersonal relationships than any books, talk shows, real-life stories or cat posters could ever dream of. It made me want to become a filmmaker because if this much craft and intelligence can be put in a film, then sign me up to the industry because I want to be a part of it. I don't want to talk about the story or the technical aspects of Inside Out because everyone has talked about it already.

In the course of less than ten months, I've see this film six times. That's more than any other film during the same period. It's a true testament to its strength and impact on me that's hardly ever going to fade away. I know this isn't the case for everybody. I keep trying to find anybody else who had the same experience as I did walking out of this film for the first time. I yielded only little results and although it brings me down a little since I don't really have anyone else to relate to, I keep telling myself, that no matter what happens to Inside Out in the future, whether its Rotten Tomatoes score or IMDb rating or its overall stature among the general public, whether it gets worse or better for it, this will always be favourite film of all-time. Nothing will change that and I have to let go of everybody else's opinion whether or not they had similar emotional experiences towards it.

You can vote "not helpful" on this review all you want (which seems to be a recurring case for all positive user reviews here.... I wonder why...) but it's not going to matter anyway. This is a beautiful film that will resonate in me always.

I will never forget Inside Out.","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":10,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":660021,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":8.1,"contentRating":"PG","genre":["Animation","Adventure","Comedy"],"datePublished":"2015-06-17","keywords":"joy,sadness,anger,memory,running away","trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"In Theaters: June 19","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi203730969","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjAyNDg5MjEwMl5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwODQyNDM5NTE@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjAyNDg5MjEwMl5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwODQyNDM5NTE@._V1_.jpg","description":"Inside Out is in theaters on June 19!","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0688132/","name":"Amy Poehler","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0352778/","name":"Bill Hader","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0085400/","name":"Lewis Black"],"director":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0230032/","name":"Pete Docter","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0215455/","name":"Ronnie Del Carmen"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0017902/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0008970/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0230032/","name":"Pete Docter","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0215455/","name":"Ronnie Del Carmen","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0498834/","name":"Meg LeFauve"],"duration":"PT1H35M"</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Axios
programme.desc: Dobitnik Emmyja Matthew O'Neill i Perri Peltz režiraju i produciraju limitiranu dokumentarnu seriju s vijestima, orijentiranim specijalima nove medijske tvrtke Axios. Dobitnik Emmyja Matthew O'Neill i Perri Peltz režiraju i produciraju limitiranu dokumentarnu seriju s vijestima, orijentiranim specijalima nove medijske tvrtke Axios. O'Neilll i Peltz rade s vodećim Axiosovim novinarima kako bi stavili naglasak na politiku, biznis i tehnologiju sljedećeg tjedna - kao i velike teme koje oblikuju budućnost. Svako izdanje AXIOS-a pokriva aktualni veliki problem iza kojeg slijede kratki dokumentarci, poučni intervjui s važnim osobama te pouzdani uvidi preneseni AXIOS-ovom tipičnom "inteligentnom jezgrovitošću" u sažetom, djeljivom formatu.

programme.title: Deadpool 2
Deadpool 2
programme.desc:
Deadpool 2: Directed by David Leitch. With Ryan Reynolds, Josh Brolin, Morena Baccarin, Julian Dennison. Foul-mouthed mutant mercenary Wade Wilson (a.k.a. Deadpool) assembles a team of fellow mutant rogues to protect a young boy with supernatural abilities from the brutal, time-traveling cyborg Cable." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt5463162/","name":"Deadpool 2","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMDkzNmRhNTMtZDI4NC00Zjg1LTgxM2QtMjYxZDQ3OWJlMDRlXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNTU5MjkzMTU@._V1_.jpg","description":"Foul-mouthed mutant mercenary Wade Wilson (a.k.a. Deadpool) assembles a team of fellow mutant rogues to protect a young boy with supernatural abilities from the brutal, time-traveling cyborg Cable.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt5463162/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"DeadMansTrousers"},"dateCreated":"2019-01-23","inLanguage":"English","name":"Honest review of all 3 versions","reviewBody":"It's true that you can have too much of a good thing...please no more different editions!

THEATRICAL CUT - was the best version of any of the "cuts" it was the most cleanly edited and it had the best soundtrack out of the three. It is clear after seeing all the versions of the film that they tested all of the jokes and the ones included were cherry picked, and the best were picked to be included in this one.

SUPER DUPER CUT/EXTENDED - this was supposed to be an extended version of the film but it was actually a different cut...what I mean by that is that they changed the soundtrack and they cut out what I considered to be some of the funniest jokes from the theatrical cut and replaced them. They ALSO added some additional footage to the film after making those changes. This version of the film feels darker and less funny to me personally so I prefer the theatrical cut over it.

ONCE UPON A DEADPOOL/PG13 - This is the edition that nobody asked for and is the most unnecessary. From an editing standpoint this version of film is very sloppy, and seems like one giant montage. They don't even start this version of the film out at the beginning it jumps right into the "safe room scene". A lot of the footage included in this edition was already available on the home releases and online (apart from the short amount filmed with Fred Savage). The movie would end up edited on TV regardless of this edition existing or not. So in reality there was no need for this edition to exist apart from making more money.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":524952,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.7},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Action","Adventure","Comedy"],"datePublished":"2018-05-18","keywords":"anti hero,japanese girl,based on comic book,marvel comics,superhero","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Official Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2984557081","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BM2YwNzViMzEtYTEyMS00MWIyLTkzY2UtZTRlMWViNTJlNGMzXkEyXkFqcGdeQW1yb3NzZXI@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BM2YwNzViMzEtYTEyMS00MWIyLTkzY2UtZTRlMWViNTJlNGMzXkEyXkFqcGdeQW1yb3NzZXI@._V1_.jpg","description":"'Deadpool 2' is heading back to theaters for 12 days from Dec. 12, 2018, re-cut for a PG-13 audience. In new scenes, Fred Savage will be seen alongside Deadpool, in an homage to Savage's starring role in the 'The Princess Bride.'"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005351/","name":"Ryan Reynolds"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000982/","name":"Josh Brolin"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1072555/","name":"Morena Baccarin"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0500610/","name":"David Leitch"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0000756/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0047120/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0566686/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1014201/","name":"Rhett Reese"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1116660/","name":"Paul Wernick"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005351/","name":"Ryan Reynolds"}],"duration":"PT1H59M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Hemingway & Gellhorn
Hemingway i Gellhorn
programme.desc: Hemingway & Gellhorn: Directed by Philip Kaufman. With Nicole Kidman, Clive Owen, David Strathairn, Rodrigo Santoro. A drama centered on the romance between Ernest Hemingway and World War II correspondent Martha Gellhorn, Hemingway's inspiration for For Whom the Bell Tolls, and the only woman who ever asked for a divorce from the writer." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0423455/","name":"Hemingway & Gellhorn","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjQ1OTM3OTY0MF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwNTY4MDU4Nw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"A drama centered on the romance between Ernest Hemingway and World War II correspondent Martha Gellhorn, Hemingway's inspiration for For Whom the Bell Tolls, and the only woman who ever asked for a divorce from the writer.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0423455/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"CryptoGuy"},"dateCreated":"2012-06-05","inLanguage":"English","name":"A Shallow Attempt","reviewBody":"I was really disappointed in this movie. The build up and anticipation for it was great. I had high expectations. With Clive Owen and Nicole Kidman leading the charge, it was Kaufman's to screw up, and screw it up he did.\n\nThe characters were shallow, but they fit right in with the ankle deep script. I thought the historic film gimmick was overplayed and laughable at times. Clive Owen tried his hardest to bring life to Stahl and Turner's straw-man. Hemingway never had any real motive and when it appeared that he might, it was abandoned. Nicole Kidman did a fine job as well, but it had to be long days and frustrating nights with the stiff dialogue. The supporting cast was lifeless, filled with assumptions, and caricatures of an era. Watching this film was like watching an artist that promised to paint you a masterpiece then he pulled out a mop. This was sloppy film-making and it started with the script and ended with the director. A poor showing for such a rich subject.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":4}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":9450,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.3},"contentRating":"TV-MA","genre":["Biography","Drama","Romance"],"datePublished":"2012-05-28","keywords":"war correspondent,writer,divorce,winter war,spanish civil war","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000173/","name":"Nicole Kidman"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0654110/","name":"Clive Owen"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000657/","name":"David Strathairn"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0442241/","name":"Philip Kaufman"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0186937/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0331056/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0008693/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0821466/","name":"Jerry Stahl"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0193009/","name":"Barbara Turner"}],"duration":"PT2H35M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Inside Out
Izvrnuto obrnuto
programme.desc:
Inside Out: Directed by Pete Docter, Ronnie Del Carmen. With Amy Poehler, Phyllis Smith, Richard Kind, Bill Hader. After young Riley is uprooted from her Midwest life and moved to San Francisco, her emotions - Joy, Fear, Anger, Disgust and Sadness - conflict on how best to navigate a new city, house, and school." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt2096673/","name":"Inside Out","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOTgxMDQwMDk0OF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNjU5OTg2NDE@._V1_.jpg","description":"After young Riley is uprooted from her Midwest life and moved to San Francisco, her emotions - Joy, Fear, Anger, Disgust and Sadness - conflict on how best to navigate a new city, house, and school.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt2096673/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Heinzwill"},"dateCreated":"2016-07-29","inLanguage":"English","name":"Beyond Words...","reviewBody":"It's been nearly a year since I first saw this film. I would say I had pretty low knowledge in films before I first saw Inside Out (not to say that I'm highly intelligent on films now). I only saw about 200 films prior. I hadn't seen a lot of classic films or even know that film can be an art form just through its camera work among other aspects. So you could say that I can't speak for everyone on my views of this film. And you may be right because opinions are subjective anyway.

This is my favourite film ever.

Like I said above, I didn't see a lot of films that were deemed as masterpieces at that time. While I still have a lot more to see, I can say that I have caught up with many notable ones now. I've seen The Godfather. I've seen 2001: A Space Odyssey. I've seen Casablanca. I've seen The Shawshank Redemption. I've seen Pulp Fiction. I've seen Lawrence of Arabia.

Yet this is still my favourite film of all-time.

80 years from now, this won't change. I felt something extraordinary that will never be felt again. This to me, was a revelation. In honest words I've never experienced something like this before. Only because of Inside Out I was able to kick myself off of a serious depression I had for years, understand the meaning of feeling, feel sympathy to why people act the way they do, be interested in films. In fact, I went and watched the films I mentioned above because of Inside Out.

Ever since that late July of 2015 I had been compulsively obsessed with Inside Out to the point where I checked its Oscar chances, IMDb rating, Rotten Tomatoes rating and box office grosses to the point where I felt like I had to stop myself from doing as when seeing anything negative about it just makes feel let down and quite sad about it. It's still something that I'm trying to quit but obviously it's not going that well (ie. this review after one year of the film's release).

Inside Out taught me more about depression, empathy, importance of sorrow and interpersonal relationships than any books, talk shows, real-life stories or cat posters could ever dream of. It made me want to become a filmmaker because if this much craft and intelligence can be put in a film, then sign me up to the industry because I want to be a part of it. I don't want to talk about the story or the technical aspects of Inside Out because everyone has talked about it already.

In the course of less than ten months, I've see this film six times. That's more than any other film during the same period. It's a true testament to its strength and impact on me that's hardly ever going to fade away. I know this isn't the case for everybody. I keep trying to find anybody else who had the same experience as I did walking out of this film for the first time. I yielded only little results and although it brings me down a little since I don't really have anyone else to relate to, I keep telling myself, that no matter what happens to Inside Out in the future, whether its Rotten Tomatoes score or IMDb rating or its overall stature among the general public, whether it gets worse or better for it, this will always be favourite film of all-time. Nothing will change that and I have to let go of everybody else's opinion whether or not they had similar emotional experiences towards it.

You can vote "not helpful" on this review all you want (which seems to be a recurring case for all positive user reviews here.... I wonder why...) but it's not going to matter anyway. This is a beautiful film that will resonate in me always.

I will never forget Inside Out.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":10}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":660021,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":8.1},"contentRating":"PG","genre":["Animation","Adventure","Comedy"],"datePublished":"2015-06-17","keywords":"joy,sadness,anger,memory,running away","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"In Theaters: June 19","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi203730969","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjAyNDg5MjEwMl5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwODQyNDM5NTE@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjAyNDg5MjEwMl5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwODQyNDM5NTE@._V1_.jpg","description":"Inside Out is in theaters on June 19!"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0688132/","name":"Amy Poehler"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0352778/","name":"Bill Hader"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0085400/","name":"Lewis Black"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0230032/","name":"Pete Docter"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0215455/","name":"Ronnie Del Carmen"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0017902/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0008970/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0230032/","name":"Pete Docter"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0215455/","name":"Ronnie Del Carmen"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0498834/","name":"Meg LeFauve"}],"duration":"PT1H35M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Australia
Australija
programme.desc:
Australia: Directed by Baz Luhrmann. With Shea Adams, Eddie Baroo, Ray Barrett, Tony Barry. Set in northern Australia before World War II, an English aristocrat who inherits a sprawling ranch reluctantly pacts with a stock-man in order to protect her new property from a takeover plot. As the pair drive 2,000 head of cattle over unforgiving landscape, they experience the bombing of Darwin, Australia, by Japanese forces firsthand." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0455824/","name":"Australia","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZjJhMTAyZWMtMjRlZC00NWU3LTg3ODQtYTkyZjRiN2NhY2Y5XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNTIzOTk5ODM@._V1_.jpg","description":"Set in northern Australia before World War II, an English aristocrat who inherits a sprawling ranch reluctantly pacts with a stock-man in order to protect her new property from a takeover plot. As the pair drive 2,000 head of cattle ","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0455824/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Imdbidia"},"dateCreated":"2011-02-22","inLanguage":"English","name":"Old-style epic romantic movie","reviewBody":"An entertaining romantic drama by Buz Luhrmann, old-Hollywood style.

The movie is set in the Northern Territory of Australia in the years previous to the involvement of Japan in the WW II, and tells the story of Sarah Ashley -an English lady who goes to Australia to try to get her husband back to England and ends becoming the head of their Australian cattle farm-, Drover -an independent free-spirited cattle and horse drover that works for her- and Nullah -a half-caste Aboriginal child who lives in the farm and struggles to live in a world in which he's alien to both blacks and whites.

This is one of those movies that you can say it is done as the movies of the golden era of Hollywood used to be - flashy wonderfully well-looking movie stars, great scenery and great studio settings, detailed recreation of the era's fashion, decoration, atmosphere, etc., , and a simple epic plot with a great love story. Australia has all of this, but also a little bit of corn, a thin plot, weak characters and flaws that are even more noticeable in a super-production like this.

The script is uneven and Manichean (with angels and demons) and mixes several movie genres (romantic comedy, romantic drama, war movie, western movie, and Aboriginal movie) with different degrees of success. The characters are descriptive and without emotional depth, and that affects the acting. However, I loved the depiction of the magic and wisdom of Aboriginal Australians, which is really well presented, with its magic beliefs and philosophical and environmental approach to the world. I think that part is truly genuine and real and reaches the viewer. I also loved that Lady Ashley's character is the one of a true modern woman, as she is a strong-willed free woman, a boss, the boss of her man, a woman who always leads, never submissive or afraid of being alone if she doesn't get what she wants. That's a post-modern woman, so rare to see in cinema nowadays.

The acting is unconvincing on the part of the leading actors. Hugh Jackman's performance is just OK in his role, while Nicole Kidman disappoints in the comic part of the movie, as she seems not to relax when she does so, but she warms up to her usual self when the story becomes more dramatic; she looks beautiful in this movie, like a 50s movie star, although those inflated siliconed lips were a distraction... Jackman and Kidman make a great couple, but their chemistry on camera was nothing memorable and you see yourself seeing two actors playing a couple, not a real couple on screen.

Most supporting actors are good in their roles, especially the Aboriginal ones, who really shine in this film. David Gulpilil is simply terrific, completely believable and inspired in his role of the Aboriginal Elder King George. Brandon Walters, despite his youth, offers a memorable performance, and his face really lights up the screen. Also great is the actor who plays Drove's Aboriginal pal, who also offers a solid performance. They are the ones who really give soul to the movie.

Despite what you might expect, the cinematography is poor. I was expecting the rare beauty of the Northern Territory to be captured by the always stylish and colorful Luhrmann. However, the part of the movie that happens during the dry season is completely opaque and colorless, ugly to watch, while the scenes happening during the rainy season are again limited in colors.To my disenchantment, many of the most colorful and beautiful scenes are digitally created or enhanced, while others seem to have been shot in big studios. Just the Mission island seems to convey that luxurious real feeling of the NT vegetation. Some of the most beautiful bits of the real land, the aerial vistas, look like if they had been taken for a documentary for National Geographic. Where is the emotional connection of the story with the land? In other words, the viewer doesn't go beyond what the eyes see. So, one wonders, why the movie was called Australia and why it was sold as a movie that captured the spirit of this country. To be honest, I thought that most scenes in the movie could have been shot anywhere in the world not in Australia.

The movie is a little too long. Most of the first half an hour could have been removed , condensed or presented in another way to give the non-Aboriginal characters more emotional background and depth. For example, we barely know why Neil Fletcher wants so badly Sarah's farm, and why he's so wicked in general but he loves a lovable sweet good- hearted woman. He is just an archetypal bad-guy, period.

Despite its flaws, I enjoyed the movie, especially the second hour and a half, and that heaven of a man that is Hugh Jackman. God Bless him and his holy body.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":122133,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.6},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Adventure","Comedy","Drama"],"datePublished":"2008-12-24","keywords":"prejudice,year 1942,year 1939,male objectification,australian aborigine","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Australia: Trailer #2","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1784152089","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjI5NzMwOTUwMV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwOTQ4MTczMzE@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjI5NzMwOTUwMV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwOTQ4MTczMzE@._V1_.jpg","description":"Set in northern Australia before World War II, an English aristocrat who inherits a sprawling ranch reluctantly pacts with a stock-man in order to protect her new property from a takeover plot"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000173/","name":"Nicole Kidman"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0413168/","name":"Hugh Jackman"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0011354/","name":"Shea Adams"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0525303/","name":"Baz Luhrmann"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0000756/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0062619/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0068628/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0064181/","name":"Stuart Beattie"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0525303/","name":"Baz Luhrmann"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0367838/","name":"Ronald Harwood"}],"duration":"PT2H45M"}</script><metacontent="
